general.general_no_permission: You have no permission to use this Command!
general.general_no_admin_rights_on_server: You have no Admin rights on this server!
general.general_command_disabled_by_admin: This command is disabled by server Admin!
general.is_imune: {{get_AdminName}} is server Admin! Server admins are protected!
general.info_msg_sent_to_server: Information Message sent to the Server!

RconConsoleCommand.server_not_found: No Server found with this ID!

RconGetssAll.ss_all_executed: Screenshot all Players command successfully executed!

RconAdminAction.screentell_msg_web: Private Screen Message successfully sent to {{get_PlayerName}}

RconChatAction.chat_and_voice_mute_rcon_command_reason: {{get_PlayerGuid}} you have been kicked and chat muted for (duration: {{get_TimeNumber}} {{get_Category}}) with reason: ^5{{get_Reason}}
RconChatAction.chat_and_voice_mute_server_message: ^6{{get_PlayerName}} ^7kicked and Chat Muted (^5 {{get_TimeNumber}} {{get_Category}} ^7) by admin ^5{{get_Admin}} ^7 with reason {{get_Reason}}
RconChatAction.voice_mute_rcon_command_reason: {{get_PlayerGuid}} you have been kicked and Voice muted for (duration: {{get_TimeNumber}} {{get_Category}}) with reason: ^5{{get_Reason}}
RconChatAction.voice_mute_server_message: ^6{{get_PlayerName}} ^7kicked and Voice Muted (^5 {{get_TimeNumber}} {{get_Category}} ^7) by admin ^5{{get_Admin}} ^7 with reason {{get_Reason}}

Rcongetss.max_ss_hourly: Maximum screenshots per/hour for regular users: {{get_MaxNumber}}!

RconPermban.no_ss_found: This screenshot doesnt exist, it may be removed in the mean time

RconPermbanNoImage.no_reason_given_error: You can not Ban without a reason!

RconPermbanOnReport.send_info_msg_to_reporter: Cheater Reporter informed that this player is already banned!
RconPermbanOnReport.ty_to_reporter: {{get_BannedName}} is permanently banned thanks to @{{get_ReporterName}}s cheater report. Thank you for all your assistance! We really appreciate your help! Good Job!

RconUnban.permban_not_found: This permban doesnt exist, it may be removed in the mean time!

globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response on Your Cheater Report
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: Thank you for all your assistance! We really appreciate your help!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response to Your Cheater Report
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: Thank you for contacting us! Based on the screenshot what you have sent to us {{reported_PlayerName}} seems to be clean!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response to Your Cheater Report
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: Based on the screenshot what you have sent to us we have permanently banned {{get_BannedPlayerName}}! Thank you for all your assistance! We really appreciate your help! Good Job!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_pl: {{get_BannedPlayerName}} is permanently banned, you can find the ban here Banlist
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response to Your Unban Request
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: Thank you for contacting us! Based on the Unban Request what you have sent to us, we decided not to Accept it. The Permanent Ban will be not removed!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response to Your Unban Request
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: We decided to accept your Unban Request! You can now join our Servers!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response to Your Admin Application
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: After a little conversations with existing Admins on our Game Servers, we decided not to accept your Admin Application! This decision is not permanent and may change in future if you submit a new Admin Application!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response on Your Admin Application
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: After a little conversations with existing Admins on our Game Servers, we decided to Accept your Admin Application! Congratulations welcome to {{get_WebSite}}!
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_li: Admin response on Your Admin Application
globalnotifications.globalnotifications_display_responses_me: Please do note that it can take some days until we decide your fate. Applications that do not get declined instantly for obvious reasons will be discussed with other Admins!
